import React, { Component } from 'react' import './style.css' class formOngs extends Component { state = { nome:'', cnpj:'', endereco:'', telefone:'', email:'', } cadastrarOngs = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const ongs = this.state console.log(ongs) fetch('https://localhost:44351/api/Ongs', { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(ongs) }).then(() => { console.log("Nova Ong Adicionada") window.alert("Cadastro realizado com Sucesso!") }) } render() { return (

Cadastre sua ONG

this.setState({nome: e.target.value})}>
this.setState({cnpj: e.target.value})}>
this.setState({endereco: e.target.value})}>
this.setState({telefone: e.target.value})}>
this.setState({email: e.target.value})}>
) } } export default formOngs
